content.raw:
we ended up enabling cppcheck for headers in gazebo to check the templates and inline functions:

* https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/782/fix-907-enable-cppcheck-for-header-files/diff
* https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/issues/906/isinf-function-requires-std-prefix-on-osx

so I think there is some utility in checking the header files, though the cppcheck developer said that shouldn't be done
